robot.navigation

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.navigation.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    The navigation class that is responsible for moving the robot from point A to point B and/or rotabe by an angle T
    Since:
    11/03/2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andreas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Navigation(TwoWheeledRobot robo)
      Requires the odometer as an input along with the two motors for each wheel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Navigation

        public Navigation(TwoWheeledRobot robo)
        Requires the odometer as an input along with the two motors for each wheel.
        Parameters:
        odometer - - Odometery for the robot
        leftMotor - - Motor for the left wheel
        rightMotor - - Motor for the right wheel

        Initiates the traveling to a particular point

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double theta,
          int direction)
        Initiates the turning to a particular angle
        Parameters:
        theta - - The angle to turn to
        direction - - The direction to turn 0:don't care; 1:clockwise; 2:counter clockwise
